comment.author: 43688219@N00
comment._content: The Canadian National Archive has the enlistment papers for a Samuel Walter Abbott who would rise to the rank of Captain in the Canadian Expeditionary Force. He was born June 26th 1877 at Eyrecourt, Co.Galway, Ireland and was still single at the time of his enlistment. He gave his occupation as Agent and stated he had seen previous military service with the 34th Fort Garry Horse. He gave his next of kin as his sister. Miss C E Abbot, of Rathmichael, Shankhill, Co Dublin. He enlisted at Winnipeg, Manitoba. www.collectionscanada.gc.ca/databases/cef/001042-119.02-e... At the time of his enlistment he was 5 feet 9 inches tall, with brown hair and bue eyes.. www.collectionscanada.gc.ca/databases/cef/001042-119.02-e...

comment._content: He was a financial and real estate agent newspaperarchive.com/winnipeg-free-press/1914-06-26/page-13
